title: Cognitive Load Management in Remote Language Learning Environments: Application of the ADIDAS Model

context.additional_context: Need for personalized learning pace adjustment in a non-real-time LMS environment. Compatibility with diverse devices in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) setting must be considered.

learning_goals: Learners can apply three cognitive load management strategies in asynchronous remote learning after four weeks.
Learners can design a language learning module following the six-stage process of the ADIDAS model.
Learners can reduce unnecessary cognitive load by at least 30% during LMS-based learning.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
